ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: A study of the secularization paradigm from different perspectives. Interesting course - I found it hard to keep up with the readings, but other than that, it was a fine course.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It helped a great deal in providing a wide range of views on Western secularization. It was very relevant to my research, and helped me contextualize a great deal. It also introduced me to a wide range of relevant thinkers who came up in discussion, whomI hope to study in greater detail in the future.
